title: Kenyan Government Says It Has ‘Suspended’ Worldcoin Activities
description: The Kenyan interior ministry said on Aug.2 that Worldcoin’s activities in the country have been “suspended” in order to give government agencies an opportunity to assess the cryptocurrency project’s potential risks to public safety. The country’s interior minister Kithure Kindiki reportedly warned of unspecified consequences for those violating the country’s laws. Probe Into Worldcoin’s Activities […]

title: ASIC Accuses eToro of Mismanagement Over High-Risk CFD Products
description: The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC) has initiated proceedings in the Federal Court against eToro Aus Capital Limited (eToro), the popular online investment platform. This legal action is driven by allegations regarding eToro’s handling of their Contract for Difference (CFD) product. This move represents ASIC’s initial legal action focusing on design and distribution responsibilities ... Read more

title: BlockFi’s recovery journey gains momentum with crucial court approval
description: BlockFi, the prominent cryptocurrency lender, has taken a significant step forward in its reorganization efforts as the United States bankruptcy court in New Jersey provisionally approved the company’s disclosure statement.  In a joint statement released on August 2, 2023, BlockFi and the Official Committee of Unsecured Creditors called upon all eligible parties to vote in ... Read more

title: Crypto and AI mania shine spotlight on Chainlink and Borroe
description: Chainlink and Borroe are noteworthy because they implement AI and crypto

title: US DoJ reportedly considering fraud charges against Binance to minimize impact
description: Federal prosecutors are concerned that an indictment could result in a deposit rush at Binance, reminiscent of the FTX's fall in late 2022

title: Top New ERC-20 Token “Golden Inu”  To Be Listed On CoinMarketCap, Coinbase, CoinGecko Soon
description: Crypto Traders who bought into the Golden Inu presale last month and those who have recently swapped their ETH for Golden, are expecting a massive increase to their portfolio value [by percentage]soon.   Via twitter, the developers of the $GOLDEN [ERC-20] token have announced the trending Ethereum-blockchain based crypto will be listed on CoinMarketCap and [...]

title: Investors Rejoice as InQubeta (QUBE) Rockets to New Heights, Outshining Polkadot (DOT)
description: Amidst the fluctuating world of cryptocurrency, investors are celebrating as InQubeta (QUBE) ascends to new heights, outshining even the formidable Polkadot (DOT). title: Why Is Solana Still in the Top 10 Having Fallen So Many Times?
description:
Over the years, we have witnessed numerous digital assets rise and fall, unable to withstand the relentless market forces and the ever-changing landscape. Among them, Solana has emerged as a fascinating case study. Continually defying the odds to maintain its position among the elite. title: Top Analyst Benjamin Cowen Issues Warning on Litecoin Amid LTC Halving Event, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin
description:
Top crypto analyst Benjamin Cowen is warning about Litecoin (LTC) after its halving event while updating his outlook on Bitcoin (BTC). Cowen tells his 754,600 Twitter followers that the peer-to-peer payments network will likely decline in price after Wednesday’s halving event when miners’ rewards were cut in half. “As mentioned a month ago, LTC tends […]

The post Top Analyst Benjamin Cowen Issues Warning on Litecoin Amid LTC Halving Event, Updates Outlook on Bitcoin appeared first on The Daily Hodl.
